headline: Is Fortive Still Priced Right After Automation Acquisition and Recent Share Rebound?
summary: Wondering if Fortive is a hidden value play or if the market has already priced in its potential? You are in the right place to find out. Fortive's stock has edged up 0.5% over the past week and gained 6.0% this month, but it is still down 30.7% for the year so far. This highlights both recent optimism and lingering caution among investors. Recent headlines around Fortive have centered on the company's expansion into new industrial technology markets, following its acquisition of a leading...
